author: IGN
description:
If DOOM: The Dark Ages has overstayed its welcome but you're looking to dig your teeth into something similar where you're violently slaying demons and other creatures from the underworld, then look no further than Painkiller. Painkiller has a very distinct design inspiration and fans of the id Software led DOOM franchise may just want to keep an eye on this one. Here's 10 minutes of Painkiller gameplay.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Painkiller Gameplay - 10 Minutes of DOOM-Like Action

description:

Place turrets and shoot down enemy planes in Keep, coming soon to PC (Steam), with a demo available now for PC.

#Keep #Gaming #IGN
title: Keep - Official Demo Launch Trailer

description: Forged in ’67. Unleashed in ’25. Watch the Fast & Furious: Arcade Edition trailer for the racing game to see the 1967 Shelby Mustang GT500 in action. Fast & Furious: Arcade Edition will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on October 24, 2025.
title: Fast & Furious: Arcade Edition - Official 1967 Shelby Mustang GT500 Trailer

author: IGN
description: Jeff Goldblum? Flesh eating dinosaurs in captivity? You got it. Jurassic World Evolution 3 is here and we have a couple clips of Jeff Goldblum introducing the world of Dinosaurs, how it all began in Jurassic Park, and footage of a Trex, Indominus Rex, Raptors, and more. Here's 8 minutes of Jurassic World Evolution 3 gameplay.
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3: Jeff Goldblum Intro and Dinosaur Spotlight

author: IGN
description: Check out the latest Insurgency: Sandstorm trailer for the tactical first-person shooter game to see what to expect with Update 1.19: Operation: Shell Shock. The Operation: Shell Shock update adds new weapons, including two new free shotguns with the S12K for Security and the US12 for Insurgents; the “ChadTeam666” limited-time game mode; and additional patches. Newly added premium cosmetic DLC sets are also available in the 4-Year Anniversary Edition, the Year 4 Pass, or for individual purchase. The Operation: Shell Shock update for Insurgency: Sandstorm is available now on PlayStation, Xbox, and PC via Steam, the Microsoft Store, and Epic Games Store.
title: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Official Operation: Shell Shock Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON English dub is available now on Crunchyroll, with new episodes premiering every week!

Deku and the heroes are plunged into a final battle against villains across Japan. Deku, by fully unleashing One For All Quirks, faces off against Shigaraki. A young and refreshed All For One faces Armored All Might, Quirkless in his powered armor suit. Will Deku be able to bring the story of how they all became the greatest heroes to its finale? Or will everything be destroyed?!

#IGN #Anime
title: My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON - Official Trailer (English Dub)

author: IGN
description:
Take a stroll down memory lane with this trailer for My Hero Academia Final Season, featuring Deku. My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON is now streaming on Crunchyroll with new episodes premiering every week.

Izuku has dreamt of being a hero all his life—a lofty goal for anyone, but especially challenging for a kid with no superpowers. That’s right, in a world where eighty percent of the population has some kind of super-powered “quirk,” Izuku was unlucky enough to be born completely normal. But that’s not enough to stop him from enrolling in one of the world’s most prestigious hero academies.

#IGN #Anime
title: My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON - Official Deku Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Darkenstein 3D is available now on Steam. Watch the action-packed Darkenstein 3D launch trailer for this retro shooter inspired by Wolfenstein 3D and DOOM. In Darkenstein 3D, you play as the Hobo Guy, a furious drifter trapped behind enemy lines in 1940s Germany. Your mission: blast your way through 13 handcrafted levels, tear through waves of Axis soldiers, uncover alien conspiracies, and rescue your kidnapped dog, Gunther.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Darkenstein 3D - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Dames 4 Games is back with another spooky season showcase, titled Ghouls 4 Games! Tune in on Friday, October 24 at 12pm PT / 3pm ET / 8pm GMT for exciting horror and thriller-filled game reveals from women gaming developers.
title: Dames 4 Games – Fall 2025 Ghouls 4 Games Showcase

author: IGN
description: The Indie Horror Showcase is back with all the spooky, horror-filled games just in time for Halloween! Tune in on Thursday, October 23 at 10am PT / 1pm ET for 90 minutes of gameplay, trailers, and quite possibly jump scares throughout the showcase. If you are into horror games, you won't want to miss these reveals!

author: IGN
description:
The Galaxies Showcase is back for 2025 and will feature more than 50 games, along with multiple world premieres and gameplay demos. The livestream will take place on Thursday, October 23 at 12pm PT / 3pm ET / 8pm GMT, with reveals from NACON, Saber Interactive's 3D Realms label, Team17, and many more. For specifics title teases, the upcoming Dumb Ways to Die game will have its first reveal, and the popular MOUSE: P.I. For Hire will be getting a release date.

IGN is partnering with Galaxies Showcase to carry the stream and we'll be hosting our very own post-show immediately following the stream, to breakdown the biggest reveals that come out of the showcase. 

#IGN #Gaming
title: Galaxies Showcase – Autumn 2025

author: IGN
description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 gives you the option to live out the fantasy of being a lethally strong vampire, decapitating heads and drinking blood; however, it can also be incredibly brutal if you don’t know what you’re doing. While combat isn’t always the answer to getting through many of the game’s problems, you’re most likely going to need to learn a few tips if you want to survive. So, here are eight brutal combat tips for Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2.

Timecodes:
0:00 - Intro
0:28 - Avoid Open Combat
1:40 - Understand Crouching Stealth Attacks
2:48 - Slow Down Time To Your Advantage
3:46 - Don’t Neglect the Dodge
5:05 - Mix and Match Ability Trees
6:13 - Use Abilities On Multiple Enemies At Once
6:46 - Use Dead Bodies
7:44 - Test Out Ability Combinations
8:26 - Outro

#VampireTheMasqueradeBloodlines2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - 8 Essential Combat Tips

author: IGN
description:
Today, as part of our IGN First for Crimson Desert, we’re showcasing three brand new bosses: Muskan, Walter Lanford, and Kearush the Slayer. Each poses a unique challenge, making for a distinct trio of fights. So sit back, enjoy the action, and if you’ve missed any of the bosses that have previously been shown off, we'll also be showcasing every one of them, too.

#CrimsonDesert #Gaming #IGN
title: Crimson Desert: 3 Brand New Bosses Gameplay - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
The backbone of your character build in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is undoubtedly your clan choice. It will determine how particular NPCs react to you, what passive you’ll have after feeding, and how quickly you learn particular abilities. Let’s do a breakdown of each, and which one is best for you.

Timecodes:
0:00 - Intro
0:20 - Why Does Your Clan Matter?
1:35 - Brujah
2:42 - Tremere
3:44 - Banu Haqim
4:41 - Ventrue
6:05 - Lasombra
7:39 - Toreador
9:03 - Outro
title: Bloodlines 2: Which Clan (or Class) Should You Choose? (Vampire: The Masquerade)

author: IGN
description:
From its tabletop roots in 1991 to its steady evolution to the modern vampire, Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines had its humble beginning in books and dice. Through several community patches and a story that has held up through the decades, Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines is a cult classic that’s been re-vamped for the modern childe of the night. Here are seven of the biggest changes from Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines to Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2.

Timecodes: 
0:00 - Intro
0:43 - The Masquerade Works Differently
1:25 - Character Progression
1:58 - The Person In Your Head
2:40 - Third and First-Person Views
3:25 - Combat Changes
4:55 - Side Quests
5:29 - Available Clans
6:37 - Outro
title: Bloodlines 2 - 7 Biggest Changes From the Original (Vampire: The Masquerade)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, a dinosaur park simulation game based on the hit movie series developed by Frontier Developments. 

Players will assume the head of a bustling park to ensure the safety of dinosaurs and park goers. Manage prehistoric parks around the world and make key decisions to maintain safety and delight for the public and the legendary dinosaurs. 

Jurassic World Evolution 3 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Ninja Gaiden 4, the latest installment in the ninja action-adventure hack-and-slash game developed by Platinum Games, Team Ninja, and Koei Tecmo Games.

Players will slice and dice through high-octane levels as both Yakumo and Ryu Hayabusa in a deep conspiracy in near-future Tokyo to free the city from the grasp of the corrupt Underworld. 

Ninja Gaiden 4 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #NinjaGaiden4 #HackAndSlash
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Jurassic World Evolution 3 reviewed by Sarah LeBoeuf on Xbox Series X, also available on PC and PS5.

In the first Jurassic Park movie, there’s a moment when the main characters see dinosaurs in the wild for the first time and they’re almost frozen in amazement. The Jurassic World Evolution series has done an incredible job of recreating that feeling since its first installment. Seeing your first dinos leave their incubation center is always a thrill, and it gets even more exciting when your park becomes populated by pteranodons, megalodons, fierce carnivores, looming long-necked herbivores, and hybrid species that defy man and nature. Jurassic World Evolution 3 builds on an already impressive foundation to give aspiring dinosaur theme park managers more control than ever before. New features and quality-of-life updates make the third installment the pinnacle of the series, even if the scenario mode doesn’t hold a candle to the previous game’s Chaos Theory. If building and maintaining
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 Review

author: IGN
description:
Jets and Helicopters are some of the most powerful vehicles in the Battlefield franchise when they’re in the right hands, but learning how to fly on the fly is typically a short-lived experience. We’ve found a few ways to not only get used to the basics of flight, but also practice your vehicle skills in custom maps and modes against moving targets. Here’s how to fly Jets and Helicopters in Battlefield 6.

For single-player collectibles, multiplayer tips and more, check out our wiki on IGN.com.
https://www.ign.com/wikis/battlefield-6

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:37 - Jet Basic Controls
02:03 - Jet Types and Loadouts
02:48 - Helicopter Basic Controls
04:21 - Helicopter Types and Loadouts
04:48 - Helicopter Assist Mode (Hover Mode)
05:15 - Flight Strategies and Tips
05:25 - Jet Strafing Run Tactic
06:00 - Countermeasures (How to Use Flares)
06:23 - Runway Repairs and Restock
07:03 - Camera Change (First to Third Person)
07:35 - Freelook Camera
08:09 - Alternate Keyboard Controller
08:4
title: Battlefield 6 - How to Fly Jets and Helicopters (and How to Practice!)

author: IGN
description:
Megabonk’s latest update, Patch 1.0.17, is here — and it’s a big one. The standout addition is a full Fog of War map for both stages, finally letting players see where they’ve explored and easily return to key locations. The update also introduces new visual settings, including a Particles and Effects Opacity Slider to help reduce chaos (and boost performance) during late-game madness.

Alongside these quality-of-life upgrades, the patch delivers a range of balance tweaks: Fox now gains double Luck per level, Robinette’s gold buff has been rebalanced, and several items like Scarf and Cursed Doll have been adjusted to keep things fair and fun.

Check out the full patch notes for every detail, and let us know your favorite change in the comments. 
Patch v1.0.17 notes - https://steamdb.info/patchnotes/20456283/
title: Megabonk: Biggest Changes in Patch v1.0.17

author: IGN
description:
CL4NK can be one of the hardest-hitting characters in Megabonk if you tune his kit with the right components. In this video, we show you one of the best CL4NK builds we’ve discovered in Megabonk, so you’ll go from embarrassing robot to gunslinging android in no time.

We’ll cover the most ideal build, including the best weapons to maximize your damage output, the right tomes for creating your glass cannon loadout, and effective items to improve CL4NK’s intrinsic abilities. By the end of this build, CL4NK will be able to melt mobs and bosses alike, while using lifesteal to keep himself alive.

00:00 – Intro
00:34 – CL4NK Basics
01:04 – Ideal Weapons for CL4NK
02:03 – Best Tomes for CL4NK
03:35 – Most Beneficial Items for CL4NK
05:19 – CL4NK Strategy
title: Megabonk CL4NK Build Guide: Best Weapons, Tomes, and Items for Crit Madness
